About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

I've been working on websites and webpages since long across many frameworks and different styles. I've seen the transition of data-fetching to realtime in the backend world and I'm capable of providing you that infrastructure with your application. With my experience of working with different software models, I can work with and adapt to different design and content patterns to give you the best possible results!

realme Content Contributor - Year 2019

Part of the special group of people working with realme India Community who received this feat for writing quality threads consistently.

realme 100 Pioneer - 2020

Among top 100 people globally for presenting suggestions for (back then) an upcoming realme UI.
